strings.s: MOVE PICTURES ASIDE
KEEP THEM THERE
LEAVE
SEARCH MORE
Mister Kuznetsov... The safe room is right ahead...
In a few minutes you will have your item...
Humpf...
Here it is... The door to the safe room...
The timed lock is about to open... Please give it a few seconds...
_What about you, girl? You're supposed to be a hostess... Say something to brighten his mood..._
Oh... Uuuh... Congratulations, Mister Kuznetsov... You aquired an unvaluable piece of History today...
We... I mean... The Freedom Bulls hope you... enjoy... your item...
I don't give a shit about History... I only intend to make profit by reselling that junk in my country's black market...
Oh... That's horrible... I mean... I mean...
I heard you recently married Mister Miller, am I right?
Oh... You mean... The Boss... I... I...
Yeah... You both semmed really in love up there... such a scene...
That was... was.......
Damn... A girl like you must be really desperate to accept be touched by that disgusting man...
_Kick that door open, for God's Sake... This is too awkward..._
So... Why Mister Miller didn't joined us tonight?
Oh... You mean 'The Boss'... He called sick today, sir...
Yeah... You still call him by this stupid alias... Never heard about him missing important events due to sickness though...
Oh... He was not feeling well, sir... A serious case of... incontinence... and diarrhea... really gross...
Humpf... And I tought there couldn't be more reasons to be disgusted by that man...
Ha... There are lots of reasons you still don't know, sir... But I'll spare you...
_Hey... I'm gonna tell The Boss about this, bitch..._
There... It's open... Come on, girl... Get in the room and fetch Mister Kuznetsov's merchandise... We'll be waiting here...
Come on, girl... The safe room is right ahead...
You'll soon be taking your place in there among the merchandise...
Here it is... The door to the safe room...
But it seems still locked...
Are you that eager to get in? Hold your panties... The timed lock should open in a few seconds...
You know... Mister Kuznetsov runs the black market in his country and he usually buys stuff in our auctions to resell there for profit... including girls...
But you... after your stupid speech during the auction... I think he probably bought you just for fun...
Fun?
Yeah... Fun for him, of course...
There are sick stories about what he likes to do with stubborn girls like you... Sick... stories...
Sick... You, him, and everyone else in this building are the sick ones...
Ha... I just want to be there when he breaks this attitude of yours...
But by the value he paid for you... he will probably place you in his elite team...
Elite... team?
Yeah... He also runs the most famomus high class escort service in east Europe... Old rich men from the whole world pay top money for a night with his elite escorts...
Looks like you're going to meet a LOT of them...
This... this won't happen to me...
Yeah... Keep clinging to hope while you still have it...
There... It's open... Get in now and wait for Mister Kuznetsov there... He always make a private 'quality check' of his girls before taking them home...
Come in... I did it... I did it...
Did you get in? Is this really the safe room?
I hope so... It looks like another mess of a place... Just like everywhere around here...
It kinda seems a storage room to me... You have to search this place quickly...
Yes... The Goddess Slab must be somewhere here...
Is... Is this thing... for real? They wouldn't simply let a real missile leaning on the wall of a storage room, would they?
Seems very real to me... I just hope the warhead doesn't contain some kind of tactical nuke...
Do they really expect that this cheap fake can pass as an acient vase? It's so light that it seems made of sugar...
Well... There are always gullible people with money spend in shit like this...
A very heavy 'crystal skull'... Plain stupid... It's definetively the most absurd and worthless item I'll find in this room...
At least it's not an ALIEN crystal skull, you know...
Humm... That box looks suspicious... Can you check it from there,
Shit... From what I can read, you should definetively not get near it...
I should check if the slab is into one of these drawers...
No... Just another 9mm bullet...
There's nothing else in these drawers...
This reads... "Military Grade Pepper Spray"...
A nice stun weapon against unarmed agressors... Won't help much against a bunch or gun wielding mercenaries though...
I've been seeing pictures of this man everywhere around here... Is he the president or something?
Probably... What I know for a fact is that he has a strong aura of awesomeness...
Hey... There's something hidden behind these frames...
Oh my God... I found it! I found it!
Huh? What did you find?
This is it! The Goddess Slab!!
You mean... This old dirty piece of clay?!
Yes!! See these inscriptions? As McGuffin wrote, these must be the instructions to find the temple!! Once I translate it, I'll be able to create a map to...
Sure... This is all very interesting... But remember you're still inside the headquarters of a dangerous mercenary group...
Oh... You're... right... I still need to figure how to get out of this place...
I don't know if I can still find anything useful here... Should I leave now?
What should I do now? If I leave, they will take the Goddess Slab from me...
Well... We'll need to improvise... What about you...
Hey! Why are you taking so long?? Mister Kuznetsov is impatient!
It's... uuuhhh... because it... I mean...
...... it was stolen!!!
WHAT!?!?
The Goddess Slab was stolen! Someone uuuh... someone digged a hole into this room and took it! Maybe they are going to strike the headquarters now!
Shit... I need to call reinforcements and protect the guests!! Stay right there, girl!!
Jesus... Is this your idea of improvisation?
Well... It was the first idea that popped in head... And it worked, okay?
Now I can just leave while the guard is...
Anyone can fool these Freedom Bulls idiots like you did, girl... But thinking you can do the same to me is offensive...
Oh... I... I was just...
So are you trying to steal my artifact? Are you nothing but a pitiful thief? I deeply despise thiefs...
Every single one who tried to steal from me had a very short life time... And I intend to keep those statistics...
Oh my God, Help me... He's going to... He's going to...
I... I should try to find way to sneak out of this room before the... 'buyer'... arrives and...
Oh no... Someone is coming...
Oh... You are the... bidder......... I was... I was just...
You have much to learn...
I'm sorry... This... This is a mistake...
First lesson... You never talk before my explicit permission...
Resistance to these lessons will only make your life more difficult...
Wait... wait... I'm... I'm not supposed to be here...
Second lesson... You're supposed to be wherever I want you to be...
You... You don't understand... My name is You must have heard about a...
Third lesson... Forget about your name, and your past life...
I'll choose a new name for the new life I'm planning for you... You'll going to called... 'Sveta'...
I heard your little speech earlier... I'll make you understand that people forget about their 'human' rights when they start to feel less than 'human'...
_Oh my God, ... Help me... I need a plan to get out of here... urgent..._
Use something lying in the room to knock him down!
This room seems full of dangerous shit, Use something to put him down! Fast!
_Oh my God... To put him down?_
_But... What should I use?_
Fire the missile at him!
CHECKED MISSILE
DID NOT CHECKED MISSILE
_The missile? What the hell are you talking about? I can't even..._
Crack his head with the crystal skull!!
CHECKED SKULL
DID NOT CHECKED SKULL
_Nice idea..._
So... Do you accept your new life or...
It's a shame I have to shoot such pretty girl...
I'll show you what my submission looks like, you fucking pig!
Don't you know that bad guys who talk too much never win?
Bastard... I'm not just a 'pretty girl'... Are you ready to learn my name?
Are you ready to learn my name now? I'll stay it one more time!
AND THE CRYSTAL SKULL!!
Easy, I think it's enough...
Yeah... He won't wake up until I'm out of here...
I don't think he will ever wake up again...
Whatever... I don't care... He deserved it...
Crack his head with the vase!!
CHECKED VASE
DID NOT CHECKED VASE
_Yeah... I'll try..._
So... What about you submit to this!!
You talk too much! And I intend to get out here now!!
You must understand...
You... you...
Oh no... The vase... It's really like if it was made of sugar...
...this kind of behavior will only bring you more suffering...
...you won't even have the time to regret your stupidity...
Use the pepper spray on his face!!
CHECKED PEPER SPRAY
DID NOT CHECKED PEPER SPRAY
So... Do you accept your new life or...
It's a shame I have to shoot such pretty girl...
I'll show you what my submission looks like, you fucking pig!
Don't you know that bad guys who talk too much never win?
I hope this burn your eyes beyond repair, bastard!
I don't know if you're aware you that you don't need to empty the can for the spray make effect...
I think he will be down for several hours after this...
He deserved much worse...
Uuuuuhh...
Uuuuuhh... Sorry... I can't think anything that could help now...
_Oh no, no, no..._
You'll need to 'soften' him so he can open his guard...
This guy seems dangerous... I think there's now way, but to 'soften' him a little... If you know what I mean...
Just 'pretend' to obey him so you can open his guard... Then you might have a chance to put him down...
... how can you suggest to..... simply..... submit...... to him
You'll start addressing me as 'Master Kuznetsov'...
...and finally... you'll fully submit your body to me...
_No way... No way..._
_I... I will play his game until I find an opportunity to take him down... there's... no other way... right?_
NO! GET AWAY FROM ME!! I'M NOT YOUR PROPERTY!!
Looks like I'll have a lot of fun later breaking your will...
For now, you won't have much of a choice... There's no escape from here...
_Yes... Master Kuznetsov..._
Good girl... I didn't expect you to learn so fast... Your life will be much more pleasant if you keep this behaviour...
If you make an effort, I'll put you in my elite team... You may even lead my girls one day...
For now...
YOU WILL OBEY!
Pull one of these chairs for me...
That's more like it...
Now come here... I need to make a quick inspection on you...
Humm... Nice childbearing hips indeed...
It seems you'll have a nice range of 'usage' in my organization...
But to fully check you, we'll need to get rid of these ridiculous garments...
I don't know why these idiots here always dress the girls like this...
No... Please...
Please... Master Kuznetsov...
Hey... I don't remember having allowed you to speak... Control yourself...
Stay quiet while I continue my inspection...
Nice... This is a solid B+ backside...
_Humpf... I'm no bloody B+..._
What? Did that sting your body pride?
I'll forgive this new interruption because I liked your reaction...
You'll gonna have fierce competition in your new life... This kind of feeling is important for you to be on top of my other girls...
You shoudln't worry, though... As soon as I post these previews at my website, there's going to be a long line of VIPs waiting for you...
I'm sure I'll recover my investiment in you in a very short time...
But now... I have a little challenge for you... I wanna see if you can keep your mouth shut while I do this...
Most of your future clients will want to be in control... And the moment they take off your panties is considered an important mark of their dominance over you...
Hence the importance of keeping silent...
_sob... sob..._
_nnnnngh..._
Very good... Whimpering or moaning are very welcome responses...
It's your job to know your client and use the response he would mostly appreciate...
Can you feel it?
You will soon become proud of the feeling of your panties falling to your ankles...
You'll be conditioned to empty your mind every time you feel this...
No shame... No fear... No anger... Only submission...
I can fell that you take well care of your pubic hair...
However... I'll have to personally shave you as soon as we get home... A shaved cunt is the trademark of my elite team...
Sigh... Another girl I buy here that comes with this preposterous tracking device...
And they call me a savage...
Whatever... I wouldn't inspect your rectum now anyways...
No time for it today, though... It's time for the real deal...
Come... Sit on your master's lap...
Your body is light as a feather... Slender, but fit... A combination requested often...
But now let me see how you perform...
I like how your breathing is getting heavy... It's very stimulating...
But I only showed you my penis... We have a long way to go...
First, I need to check your lubrication capabilities...
Humm... Quick natural lubrication after a few seconds of contact... A nice feature...
Please... Stop analysing me like a... product... It's so unsettling...
Ha... There are much more serious reasons for you to get nervous girl...
For example...
Oh my God... What are you doing...
As I said... Light as a feather...
You see... My clients are not like your efeminate western boyfriends... They'll handle you with a strong arm...
This should unsetlle you...
Try to keep quiet now for a very important test...
Outstandig tightness... You are an unexpected real bargain, girl...
MMmmmng... Not like this... not like this...
It is the way your master wants it to be... Just handle it...
Please... Stop teasing and take me already, master... Please...
Humm... So you are a corrupted one... This will make my work easier...
Let's see how much you can take...
_father... I'm sorry... it's going to happen..._
Sigh... I can't believe those idiots sold me a virgin and didn't even care to say... I feel like I just killed an unicorn... What a waste...
Very good... Wet, tight and warm... Money well spent...
Well... Let's see if you can really get into my elite team...
Yes... The way you twich and moan... Even after all that non willing attitude...
MMmmmnng... I should be hating this... But it feels... soooo good to be... filled by you, Master Kuznetsov...
Yes, my dear Sveta... I'll make you a star...
Nooooo... why don't you just... let me... go home...
Oh, but you're going to be home soon... At our new home...
Yeah... You're very close to grant a place in my elite team...
But how about yoy take the lead and show me what you know?
What? I don't know what are you talking about... I already told you I don't want this...
I'm sorry, Master Kuznetsov... I... I don't know what can I do to please you more...
Yes, Master Kuznetsov... I'll please you...
Yeees... this is it...
Oh... My dear Sveta... Have a true orgasm like this in front of a client, and he'll give you the world...
It's settled... I'll definetively make you my new top elite girl...
Sigh... Such disappointment...
Well... Unfortunately my days of youth are gone, and I'll need to finish this...
Uuurghh...
Get ready, now... I'll fill your insides with my seed... Marking you as mine...
Yeeehhh... Here it cooomes...
Uuurg... Let's allow it to leak for a moment... So you can have the feeling of a mission accomplished...
You posetively surprised me , girl...
Thank you, Sveta... You're a pleasant surprise...
Now go put on your clothes while I recover here... Age has been consuming my energy lately so I'll need a moment to recover...
_He'll be down for a few seconds... This is my last chance..._
I... I must try to leave while he's resting...
You really tought you could just leave me here?
You disappoint me, girl...
I'll keep you chained now... Maybe this will make you understand that you belong to me... That you are not free...
You're going to be severely punished for this when you get home...
And you can leave this little toy here... You're not allowed to have any possessions...
Now let's go home...
I'm so scared... Help me... Please...
lost her radio uplink... I tried to contact her for days without success...
I found in the dark web a few records of a girl named 'Sveta' that matched her description...
But that trail went cold... And we never heared about her anymore...
My mysterious client didn't liked this outcome and also never contacted me anymore... I had no choice... I had...
...I had to find another job...
GAME OVER\nIT'S [A] NEW LIFE FOR
It's a shame having to put a hole in such pretty face...
You could be so much, girl... Unfortunately, I can't let you live...
Goodbye, thief..
GAME OVER\nIT ENDS WITH A [B]ULLET
HIT HIM WITH THE GUN BUTT
Take that you fucking savage!
SHOOT HIM IN THE HEAD
You are the property now, asshole... Property of the worms...
SHOOT HIM IN THE DICK!!
BLYAT!!!!
_fucking shlyukha... i'm going kill you... i swear i'm going to kill you..._
No... You're going to lay there... bleeding... until I'm very far from here, you fucking pig!!!!
Hey... Look what he dropped...
Finally I have a gun and ammunition... No bloody goon can't stop me from leaving this place now...
Jesus Christ, Are you sure about that?
I'm damn sure... Finally I'll have the opportunity to do some shooting...
Now let's get out of here...
